name: AzureAppServiceManage
description: Directs destination Azure App Service slot's traffic to the source slot by performing swap
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Swap Slot for Azure Web App: $(WebAppName)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: App Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the AzureRM Web App specified above.

inputs.name: SourceSlot
inputs.label: Source Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: The swap action directs destination slot's traffic to the source slot.

inputs.name: SwapWithProduction
inputs.label: Swap with Production
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to swap the traffic of source slot with production. If this option is not selected, then you will have to provide source and target slot names.

inputs.name: TargetSlot
inputs.label: Target Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: The swap action directs destination slot's traffic to the source slot.

messages.Unabletoretrieveconnectiondetailsforazur: Unable to retrieve connection details for Azure Web App: %s . Status Code: %s
messages.Successfullyupdatedslotswaphistory: Successfully updated slot swap history at %s for Azure Web App : %s
messages.Failedtoupdateslotswaphistory: Failed to update slot swap history for Azure Web App : %s
messages.WARNINGCannotupdateslotswapstatusSCMendp: WARNING : Cannot update slot swap status : SCM (Source Control Manager) endpoint is not enabled for this Azure Web App
messages.Cannotupdatedeploymentstatusuniquedeploy: Cannot update slot swap status as unique deployment ID cannot be retrieved for this Azure Web App
messages.Failedtoswapslots: Failed to swap slots. Status %s for Azure Web App : %s
messages.Successfullyswappedslots: Successfully swapped web app %s slots from %s to %s
messages.SourceAndTargetSlotCannotBeSame: Source and target slot cannot be same
